title: FBI Warns of Scattered Spider's Expanding Attacks on Airlines Using Social Engineering
description: The U.S. Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) has revealed that it has observed the notorious cybercrime group Scattered Spider broadening its targeting footprint to strike the airline sector. To that end, the agency said it's actively working with aviation and industry partners to combat the activity and help victims.
